name: Blade Transitions
description: Developing seamless transitions between sword, knife, wrist blades, and bucklers for maximum combat efficiency and adaptability.

workout_groups.name: Fundamentals of Blade Switching
workout_groups.description: Training to switch efficiently between primary and secondary weapons while maintaining combat control.

workouts.name: Basic Weapon Hand Switching
workouts.description: Practice switching between dominant and non-dominant hands while maintaining a combat-ready stance.

workouts.name: Knife to Sword Quick Draw
workouts.description: Draw and transition from knife to sword, ensuring smooth motion and immediate combat readiness.

workouts.name: Defensive Buckler to Wrist Blade Deployment
workouts.description: Use the buckler to deflect an attack, then extend the wrist blade for a counter-strike.

workouts.name: Seamless Reverse Grip Transition
workouts.description: Transition between standard and reverse grips on both knife and sword without losing flow.

workout_groups.name: Speed-Based Transition Drills
workout_groups.description: Developing reaction speed and combat efficiency when switching between weapons in a fight.

workouts.name: Sword to Knife Quick Transition Drill
workouts.description: Drop the sword into the off-hand while drawing the knife in one motion to maintain combat engagement.

workouts.name: Wrist Blade Quick Deploy & Retract
workouts.description: Extend and retract the wrist blade while maintaining balance and hand positioning for combat flow.

workouts.name: Buckler Drop to Dual Blade Offense
workouts.description: Drop the buckler and transition into dual-wielding for aggressive counterattacks.

workouts.name: Tactical Weapon Switching Under Pressure
workouts.description: React to randomized cues, switching weapons based on situational needs.

workout_groups.name: Advanced Combat Flow with Blade Transitions
workout_groups.description: Training to instinctively switch weapons mid-fight while maintaining control, spacing, and fluidity.

workouts.name: Ambidextrous Blade Flow Drill
workouts.description: Execute rapid transitions between primary and secondary hands for a non-stop combat sequence.

workouts.name: Blade Feint to Immediate Transition
workouts.description: Fake an initial attack with one weapon, then seamlessly switch to another mid-strike.

workouts.name: Combat Tempo Shifting with Blade Transitions
workouts.description: Slow down and accelerate weapon transitions based on combat rhythm to control engagements.

workouts.name: Live Sparring with Weapon Switching
workouts.description: Engage in live combat while being required to switch between weapons based on adaptive situations.
